channel.title: CVE Feed for gopiplushotmailcom -- Jquery news ticker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gopiplushotmailcom -- Jquery news ticker

item.title: CVE-2023-5432|2023-12-19T03:30:30.598Z -- gopiplushotmailcom -- jquery%20news%20ticker
item.description: The Jquery news ticker plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'jquery-news-ticker' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
